dmca.title: removal of illegal photos on www.worldwidewives.com of Canadian Betty
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: George and Linda Lowe [mailto:gandllowe@eastlink.ca] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 28, 2006 4:36 PM
To: Legal Response
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: Re: removal of illegal photos on www.worldwidewives.com of Canadian
Betty



To the abuse team,
 
There are various photos posted on  <http://www.worldwidewives.com>
www.worldwidewives.com of myself
which were obtained illegally. You are the service provided. I have
contacted the site adminstors numerous times with no response at the
following e-mail address:
roc@worldwidewives.com,  <mailto:roc@worldwidewives.com,
therev@worldwidewives.com> therev@worldwidewives.com ,
sigmon@worldwidewives.com, vince@worldwidewives.com ,
techead@worldwidewives.com 
They are photos of Canadian Betty.
I want these photos removed immediately. I have contacted the RCMP and
they will be investigating. To avoid legal acton please remove these photos
immediately. 

What do I have to do to get these photos removed? Does my lawyer have to
write a letter indicating that I am in fact the women in the photos and that
they were obtained illegally. I won't stop trying to get these photos off
this site that you are the server for.
Beth Schulz

 
<http://promos.hotbar.com/promos/promodll.dll?RunPromo&El=&SG=&RAND=30225&pa
rtner=hbtools> Upgrade Your Email - Click here! 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Legal Response <mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com>  
To: gandllowe@eastlink.ca 
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2006 12:30 PM
Subject: FW: removal of illegal photos on www.worldwidewives.com of Canadian
Betty

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: George and Linda Lowe [mailto:gandllowe@eastlink.ca] 
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2006 6:07 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: removal of illegal photos on www.worldwidewives.com of Canadian
Betty


 


To Whom it may concern,
Illegal photo of myself, Beth Schulz have been posted on the website
www.worldwidewives.com. The planet is the server for this company. I have
contacted the adminstor of the site numerous time to have these photos
removed with no response and the photos are still on their website. I need
all photos listed Canadian Betty removed immediately. The RCMP are
investigating this matter as we speak. Please remove them to avoid any legal
action.
Beth Schulz
